item.description: Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) #cloud #Azure #virtual-machines #compute Azure Virtual Desktop, (formerly known as Windows Virtual Desktop) is a Microsoft Azure-based system for virtualizing its Windows operating systems, aimed at enterprise customers rather than at individual users.

Docker #containers #virtual-machines #docker Docker is an open source platform for building, deploying, and managing containerized applications. Docker is simply a popular implementation of Containers and has become a standard in the industry.
